Hi!

Somthing is awfully wrong with my wabbitemu. I hade downloaded the rom from ti website so i suppose that should not be the problem. Tried two different ones aswell to be shure.

Now to my problem.
When i try to use the sinus it gives me totally wrong output! For example sin(30) that should give me .5 put out -.9880316241. The same problem occurs on both my android devices..

It would be much appreciated if someone could help me with this. Im shure i have made some stupid mistake thats easy to correct for someone with the right kind of nowledge.

Sorry for my bad english but im no englishman u now :)
